exceptions¶

Exceptions¶

MayaLookupError
MayaTypeError

Description¶

General exception classes designed to provide specificity to errors produced by the OpenMaya API.

exception msTools.core.maya.exceptions.MayaLookupError¶

Bases: exceptions.RuntimeError

Raised when trying to access a Maya object that does not exist or is not unique.

Inherits RuntimeError to encompass the default behaviour of OpenMaya.MSelectionList.add() for object lookups.

Examples

  • Raise if attempting to access an OpenMaya.MPlug for a dependency node plug that does not exist.
  • Raise if attempting to access an OpenMaya.MObject for a dependency node that does not exist.
  • Raise if attempting to access an OpenMaya.MObject for a dependency node using a UUID that is not unique.
exception msTools.core.maya.exceptions.MayaObjectError¶

Bases: exceptions.RuntimeError

Raised when a Maya object reference becomes invalid.

Examples

  • Raise if an OpenMaya.MPlug references a dependency node plug which has been removed.
  • Raise if an OpenMaya.MObject references a dependency node which has been deleted.
exception msTools.core.maya.exceptions.MayaTypeError¶

Bases: exceptions.TypeError, exceptions.RuntimeError

Raised when a Maya object is referenced using a valid class type but is incompatible due to its internal type.

Inherits TypeError to encompass the default behaviour of OpenMaya.MPlug when a plug operation is incompatible with the internal plug type.

Inherits RuntimeError to encompass the default behaviour of operating on an OpenMaya.MObject which has an incompatible internal object type.

Note

This error should only be raised for exceptional behaviour relating to Maya objects whose internal type is defined statically. Any exceptional behaviour relating to dynamic Maya object properties should produce a RuntimeError.

Examples

  • Raise if an OpenMaya.MPlug is expected to reference a certain type of dependency node plug such as an array.
  • Raise if an OpenMaya.MObject is expected to reference a certain type of dependency node such as a transform.
